pouch.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a small leather, cloth, or plastic bag that you can keep things in, and which is sometimes attached to a belt
pouch.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a large bag for carrying letters or papers
pouch.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a pocket in the side of a bag such as a rucksack
pouch.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: a pocket of skin on the stomach which marsupials such as kangaroos use for carrying their babies
pouch.translation[0].definitions[4].defi: a fold of skin like a bag which animals such as hamsters or squirrels have inside each cheek to carry and store food
